item.title: Hideous Progeny: Tidytext Analysis of Frankenstein
item.description: The Moden Prometheus Capture of Frankenstein (Text) Add Chapter Column Unnest Words Most Common Words And now, once again, I bid my hideous progeny go forth and prosper. — Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley (London, 15 October 1831) The Moden Prometheus Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley’s Frankenstein (The Modern Prometheus) is one of the best stories any can read. If anyone was to start their journey in the wonderful world of stories, Frankenstein will always be my suggestion for first read.
